alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Thomas, western Sheridan, southern Rawlins and southwestern Decatur Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm producing a landspout 13 miles south of Atwood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Thomas, western Sheridan, southern Rawlins and southwestern Decatur Counties, including the following locations... Mingo, Halford and Seguin. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 43 and 65. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
